https://whimsy.apache.org/test/dataflow..description: List of other public JSON and other data sources and underlying code models.

https://whimsy.apache.org/public/icla-in.description: Names of people who have submitted ICLAs who have uids (committer accounts)
Names of people who have submitted ICLAs who don't (yet) have uids (commiter accounts)

https://whimsy.apache.org/public/member-.format: hash of arrays['members'][0] = 'aadamchik' and hash['ex_members']['dion'] = 'Deceased Member (RIP)'

https://whimsy.apache.org/public/public_.description: Membership of LDAP auth groups. Membership of an LDAP auth group is used to grant commit karma for sub-project and other resources
Membership of LDAP committee groups. Note: Membership of an LDAP committee group != membership of the PMC
Membership of LDAP unix groups. Membership of an LDAP unix group is used to grant commit karma for a whole project
Basic details of LDAP personal entries. Shows the public name and whether the login is currently disabled
Membership of LDAP service groups. For example pmc_chairs shows the list of people with PMC chair karma
Membership of auth groups not defined in LDAP. For example, Incubator podlings
Current Incubation status of each podling

https://whimsy.apache.org/public/site-sc.description: Current status of project websites relating to required navigation links

https://www.apache.org/foundation/marks/.description: Policy for display of Apache PMC websites

/lib/whimsy/asf/auth.rb.description: ASF::Authorization: Models LDAP and other authorizations based on id.apache.org; See also ASF::Person

/lib/whimsy/asf/committee.rb.description: ASF::Committee: model both PMCs and other committees; See also ASF::Person

/lib/whimsy/asf/icla.rb.description: ASF::ICLA: Tracks ICLAs and names; See also ASF::Person

/lib/whimsy/asf/ldap.rb.description: ASF::LDAP: See also ASF::Config, Person, Member, Group

/lib/whimsy/asf/mail.rb.description: ASF::Mail: Associate email addresses with Persons; See also ASF::Config, Person, Committee, Podling

/lib/whimsy/asf/member.rb.description: ASF::Member: Data and auth about ASF Members; See also ASF::Person

/lib/whimsy/asf/nominees.rb.description: Extends ASF::Person to add data about nominees around meetings

/lib/whimsy/asf/person.rb.description: ASF::Person: Data about an ICLA signer, committer, etc.; Extensive integration with ASF::LDAP for auth

/lib/whimsy/asf/podlings.rb.description: ASF::Podlings: Committee analogue for Incubator podlings

/lib/whimsy/asf/rack.rb.description: ASF::Rack: add functionality to ASF::Auth, ASF::Committers, ASF::MembersAndOfficers

/lib/whimsy/asf/site.rb.description: ASF::Site: Utility methods added to ASF::Committee

/lib/whimsy/asf/svn.rb.description: ASF::SVN: Utility for SVN repo and file access; See also ASF::Config(reads .whimsy)

/lib/whimsy/asf/git.rb.description: ASF::Git: Utility for Git repo and file access; See also ASF::Config(reads .whimsy)

/lib/whimsy/asf/agenda.rb.description: ASF::Board::Agenda: Utility for approved and posted board minutes; many touchpoints: roster tool, board minutes

private/committers/board/committee-info..description: Official record of PMC and committee membership

infrastructure-puppet/modules/subversion.description: Authorization records for source control repos

*reserved-ids.yml.description: ID names reserved from use by committers

*historic/committers.json.description: Historical data about past committer date changes

infra/infrastructure/apmail/trunk/bin/.a.description: Records about mail archives and emails

private/foundation/members.txt.description: Official record of ASF corporate Membership

special/nominated-members.txt.description: Temporary listing of Member nominees before a Member's Meeting

asf/incubator/public/trunk/content/podli.description: Listing of active podlings and incubation status details

https://www.apache.org/foundation/board/.description: Official records and calendar of ASF Board of Directors
